projects.name: Your Prompts
projects.description: Full Stack Next.js Web App in which you can find best prompts for using in your AI Journey. 10 prompts per query is our initial target.

projects.name: Nike Shoe Store
projects.description: Cloudinary setup with Strapi, creations in Strapi, Content Population in Strapi Pagination Functionality for detailed shoes according to the type Redux Toolkit setup for cart 10+ payment by STRIPE PAYMENT GATEWAY.

projects.name: OBJECT DETECTOR
projects.description: Building an AI Object Detector, playing alarm on person detection. Successfully crafted and implemented Webcam Logic TensorFlows COCO-SSD for object detection model.

projects.name: VIRTUAL ART GALLERY
projects.description: Utilized Next.js and Three.js to create a virtual art gallery with 3D art models, enhanced by AI for caption, color, and positioning suggestions. Enabled direct interaction between the public and artists, allowing updates, thoughts, and responses to questions, managed through a comprehensive admin panel. Implemented tools for artists to share paintings and for viewers to visualize artworks in their homes using AI, including 3D model assessment for suitability.

experiences.description: Managed CRUD Operations: Efficiently executed CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on the backend using .NET and ASP.NET CORE, ensuring high data integrity and seamless user interactions. Advanced SQL Query Development: Expertly engineered and implemented complex SQL queries, optimizing database performance and enabling advanced data retrieval, significantly boosting system efficiency.

Enhanced Web Design and Components: Successfully revamped and optimized the design and components of a job portal website, improving user experience and interface responsiveness. Developed and Integrated Authentication APIs: Engineered and implemented two robust authentication APIs, rigorously tested using Postman, and seamlessly integrated with the backend to ensure secure and efficient user authentication.
